channel.title: Trading Tells How Much Money -.-
channel.description:
[b]Well, I'm writing a server that's based on Pking and Economy, [u]Here's my problem with for the economy.... [/u] When you trade others, it tells the price at the bottom of the trade. In order to run a perfect economy, I cannot have this telling everyone the price. I want players to make up their own prices and trade with others. How can I remove this ?[/b]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/e6c846.jpg[/img]
[b]My source + client is a 317 loading 525 It's a Hybrid V3 PVP base.[/b]

item.title: Trading Tells How Much Money -.-
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

TradeAndDuel class find the price string and remove it

Read full topic

item.title: Trading Tells How Much Money -.-
item.dc:creator: @chains424 chains424
item.description:
@chains424 wrote:

Well, I’m writing a server that’s based on Pking and Economy,
Here’s my problem with for the economy…

When you trade others, it tells the price at the bottom of the trade. In order to run a perfect economy, I cannot have this telling everyone the price. I want players to make up their own prices and trade with others. How can I remove this ?

My source + client is a 317 loading 525
It’s a Hybrid V3 PVP base.
